text: #BridgeCollapse only two fatalies the 3rd person thought to have passed on is alive @eNCA
To all the families affected on the #BridgeCollapse we send our condolences and speedy recovery to those in a critical condition.
I feel like the "build a bridge and get over it" line I yell in #JHBTraffic would be in bad taste for a while now since the #BridgeCollapse
